text:
(I think it's different to Bug 34476 - since it worked before 1st of May)

(Cocoon 2.1.7 / Lenya 178787 OR Cocoon 2.1.7 / Lenya 179027
AND Java-Script is enabled in my Browser
AND enable.uploads=true in local.build.properties)

DEFAULT publication:

1) there is no warning, when I try to upload an asset with no title (required)
 -> though the asset will not be uploaded

2) submit-button to INSERT an asset (from the asset-library) does not work

BOTH THINGS WORK with Cocoon 2.1.7 / Lenya 165600

(I always used BXE 1.1.0-dev r1275)
creator: michael.trindler@id.unizh.ch
